entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • consider pulling long running threatpool threads from the pool #105165
    10.0.0
  • JIT: SVE - Added first-faulting behavior testing for NonFaulting APIs #105163
    9.0.0
  • Add back ILLink usage of dependency analysis framework #105159
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose JsonPropertyInfo.MemberName #105155
  • Possible unobserved IOException in HttpClient using SocketsHttpHandler #105154
  • [Apple][TVOS] Unhandled exception. System.IO.IOException: No space left on device #105146
  • Should `System.Int64.GetHashCode()` avoid dereferencing `m_value` twice? #105142
    9.0.0
  • Poor project evaluation performance for project at least under src/libraries #105139
    10.0.0
  • No-op build spends an unreasonable amount of time in the ChooseBestTargetFrameworksTask task #105138
    10.0.0
  • `LibraryImportGenerator` fails when `LibraryImportAttribute` is aliased #105137
  • nativeaot\\SmokeTests\\Reflection\\Reflection\\Reflection.cmd fails with Access Violation #105136
  • [wasm] Review relink triggering properties #105135
    10.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] Fail to launch grandnode with error "Some services are not able to be constructed" #105134
    9.0.0
  • Unmanaged memory growth with DiagnosticsClient #105132
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Clean-up internal testing related to hybrid globalization #105130
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.sh #105125
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Transactions.Tests.TransactionManagerTest.DefaultTimeout_MaxTimeout_Set_Get #105124
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Profiling problem on armv7l #105070
    9.0.0
  • XPS documents in .NET Core can't be opened #51929
    Future
  • File uploader crashes app on iOS when "use device camera" is used instead of "photo library". #94698
  • Cryptographic cryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock() Throws Exception "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" when data is passed in chunks #103470
  • Scoped ServiceProvider not releasing disposing HttpClient #96296
    Future
  • Test `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` stack overflowing in Windows x64 release for `libraries-pgo` pipeline #100246
    9.0.0
  • [mono][android] Failures in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildChainForSelfSignedCertificate_* #100224
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Security tests are failing #68206
    Future
  • Make Type.IsGenericType and GetGenericTypeDefinition() JIT intrinsics (and JIT time constants) #96898
    9.0.0
  • Need information about KB5039889 and SHA256 unsafe thread usage #105013
  • JIT: Add support for strength reduction #100913
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] [Linux] Segmentation fault in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103703
    9.0.0
  • CI error: System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #91757
    9.0.0
  • `ExposedLocalsNumbering` runtime test disabled #80184
    9.0.0
  • JIT: mcs dumpMap broken on at least one recent collection #104482
    Future
  • SIGSEGV in msquic on Linux ARM32 #103404
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support await'ing a Task<T> without throwing #97556
  • Remove Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange generic constraint #65184
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 8/25/2023 8:20:08 PM #91280
  • One about foreach and type access #80647
  • [API Proposal]: Ascii.ToUtf16 overload that treats `\0` as invalid #80366
  • CI test failures in GenerateRuntimeGraphTests on tvOS simulator and iOS simulator. #77889
    10.0.0
  • Optimize unboxing for nullable #104954
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Make X509Certificate2Collection (and X509CertificateCollection) thread-safe #100613
  • [6.0] CryptographicException : Cryptography_OAEPDecoding in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaDecryptAfterExport #99792
  • Android SslStream splits messages over 2048 bytes in multiple TLS records (breaks MS-TDS protocol) #95295
    9.0.0
  • Failure to Load libcrypto.so.1.1 and libssl.so.1.1 While Using Hikvision SDK #99455
  • [outerloop] System.Runtime.Numerics BigInteger assert failure #98966
  • Unable to use Process.Start() in Mac Catalyst Universal application in Release configuration #100129
  • JIT: `StaysWithinManagedObject` should be able to handle more cloned loops patterns #105087
    9.0.0
  • "error MSB1008: Es darf nur ein Projekt angegeben werden" while trying to compile .net 8.0.7 #105067
  • Windows build break because of System.Security.Cryptography #105126
  • Nuget Update for CVE-2024-0057 #96981
  • [API Proposal]: IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.Smoothstep #94091
  • Request for analyser ICU usage and/or TZ data #100531
  • Complex.ToString format changed from (a, b) to <a; b> #93454

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: Switch `StaysWithinManagedObject` to peel offsets from VNs #105169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix method numbering in Memory-model.md example code #105168
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove now-redundant Debug.Assert messages #105167
    needs-area-label
  • [WIP] Disallow gen1 - code by @maoni0 as a PR with the Fragmentation Fix Changes #105166
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixed for assertion failure due to not checking if we are processing Ephemeral Samples in calculate_new_heap_count #105164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Draft] JIT: Testing field-wise analysis #105162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable inversion of top-tested loops #105161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.IO.Packaging test trim safe #105160
    area-System.IO
  • Remove unused members on runtime Thread #105158
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][NO REVIEW] Testing new alpine image with Helix and libraries tests #105157
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Emit marhsalling exception when dealing with MONO_MARSHAL_CONV_OBJECT_IUNKNOWN #105156
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105153
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] Introducing Environment.CpuUsage #105152
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Some more automated C# modernization in corelib #105151
    area-Meta
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Unsafe API's #105150
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add a thread pool config var on Windows for choosing the number of IOCPs #105145
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [browser][publish] Unicode in the path are parsed correctly in Windows for AOT/relink by emcc #105144
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions #105143
    area-Meta
  • Fix clang19 build #105141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Ignore] Test change #105133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Calculate version range in init-compiler.sh script #105129
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code related to intercept stubs #105127
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105104
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable AVX for Sve leg #105113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • JIT: Improve and fix `StaysWithinManagedObject` #105108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific active issues in System.Net.Security and System.Security.Cryptography #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of SIMD comparisons #104944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable strength reduction by default #105131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Ubuntu wasm-related versions -- release/8.0-staging #105062
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetUsefulGlobals #105106
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert `GetMethodFromStackTrace` to QCall #105103
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix the ExposedLocalsNumbering test #105037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes from API review approvals #104990
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable QUIC & HTTP/3 tests for ARM #105109
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions #105121
    area-Meta
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback on DiagnosticId changes #105096
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Apply IDE0300 to corelib (use collection expressions instead of new[]) #105122
    area-Meta
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Implement GetObjectStringData #105061
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "Replace a few stackallocs with collection expressions" #105128
    area-Meta
  • Expand unboxing for Nullable<> in JIT #105073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #104443
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Move telemetry out of lock scope #105140
    area-System.Net
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Add a pass to remove unused primary IVs #105107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    GCStress, area-GC-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2498541 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NO MERGE] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Don't do aggressive block compaction too early #105041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix warning for MakeGenericType annotation mismatch #104921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Set default for disableIntegrityCheck to true #102515
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [llvm 19][mini] print some info if we're about to assert that plt_entry == NULL #105112
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [WASM] Update features doc #105068
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • handle Unicode encoding in Console.Beep #105094
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty - Get spawned thread by ID from Process.Threads to avoid mismatch #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #104728
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `in` on `Unsafe.AreSame` callsites #105000
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure that Windows is correctly saving SVE state as part of threadsuspend #105059
    area-PAL-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Use generic math for floating point formatting" for Single and Double #105038
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
